notes.text: You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
We now ensure that aggregatable properties are no longer added to the sort options
We now ensure that the quick view popover description is correctly displayed by using the TextArrangement annotation in the HeaderInfo.Description annotation
We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons

We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
We now consider the value null for filter conditions if the In-Parameter is annotated with InitialValueIsSignificant
We now display the 'Others' group in value help fields which are dropdown
We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
We have resolved an issue when adding and removing custom columns containing building blocks from the table personalization
We have resolved an issue with handling the navigation path when evaluating the filter conditions in the value list
End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue with the processing of the ODataListBinding in the Define Conditions tab
We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
When using browser autofill, we no longer read from the undefined control of the related value help
We now ensure that MDC table properties can no longer be changed in adaption projects
We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
The 'Go' button in the filter bar of a custom table now triggers a data request every time it is selected
We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
